clean_data: IT Systems Administrator IT span lSystemsspan span lAdministratorspan IT Systems Administrator San Antonio TX Experienced IT Systems Administrator with four years managing multiple software systems as the lead onsite technician Energized by a fastpaced environment with the everchanging world of Work Experience IT Systems Administrator Codilis Stawiarski PC March 2015 to February 2019 Reporting to Information Technology Director Managed day to day IT operations including directing administrative computing staff networking user services remote support telecommunications and troubleshooting Authored policies and procedure fro departmental requirements to ensure security and network health Served as relationship manager negotiating and managing IT vendor contracts Also developed proposals for ITrelated projects and served as IT lead throughout subsequent execution and implementation Developed company process guidelines procedure and best practices including business continuity and disaster recovery plans Authored with management IT Polices and implemented those policies through training in a classroom environment Developed program documentation data management plan asset management testing strategy and security plans Led and facilitated large office move from one site to another including mapped setup of server room installation of server racks and mounting kits and coordination with contractors regarding placement of ports equipment and cable routes Supervised a team of employees in the breakdown transportation and reassembly of all PC equipment Responsible for all on boarding of all new employees including training employees across multiple departments on network operations including login procedures network management software permissions printing issues security and use of software including the creation of audit files that ensure compliance and meet regulatory requirements from new hires to terminations Experience in implementing and maintaining the following VPN servers WASP Mobile Asset for Inventory Management antivirus systems to network environments Windows SCCM and Ninite Windows deployment software web filtering appliances print servers and systems and securing Windows servers with a variety of rolesHyperV Domain Controllers file servers Application and Database Servers Responsible for the imaging and deployment of all systems encompassing a number of configurations across all departments Consulted with client companies to provide Webbased and network solutions along with strategic planning and project leadership over systems migration configuration administration upgrades and troubleshooting initiatives Lead a team that digitized thousands of physical files and millions of imagines saving the company 10s of thousands of dollars in storage fees and a multitude of resourses Assisted in a number of client audits for the firm Proof of Claims Analyst Codilis Stawiarski PC October 2011 to March 2015 Reporting to the Bankruptcy Dept Manager Helped develop more efficient processes in the Proof of Claims department across multiple clients Managed of multiple clients requiring the development of multiple systems Filed claims for principal interest legal fees and expense reimbursements with the appropriate parties as well as review and submission of invoices Monitored bankruptcy plans for applicable loans in bankruptcy including filing proof of claims tracking of pre and postpetition payments filing motions for relief filing objections to bankruptcy plans Education Bachelors of Business
